title: Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream for a single woman. I see only one girl. There is a thorn that went inside her finger. When he tries to pick a rose from the garden, serious consequences. He made the wrong decision at some point, but things can improve. Whoever dreams of seeing a large group of roses mixed with many thorns and wants to pick a rose without harming it, shows her feelings of anxiety and embarrassment. To leave her life to do something. As for whom are you dreaming about? With many thorns in the palm of her hand and she is trying to pull them out, but she cannot, and this is an indication that she is going through a difficult time in her life and feels very sad. A dream with thorns in a dream for a married woman. A married woman, when she dreams that she She eats the fruit of the prickly pear with a thorn stuck in her hand, so this is a sign of her life. MoreBut something happened to take it off, but the event soon ended. As for who is dreaming about it? Her husband. He came home and he is suffering from severe pain because of that. A thorn in his hand is an indication of the presence of anxiety due to debt and who will pay for it. Soon. Whoever dreams that her son is playing in the garden and it was full of thorns, symbolizes that her son is exposed to a serious health crisis, but God will heal him soon. Seeing thorns in a dream for a pregnant woman. The pregnant woman who saw in a dream a bouquet of roses and held it in her hand and began to smell it and enjoy it, and suddenly she found a thorn that entered her hand and felt pain. Slight because of this, it indicates feeling slight pain during the months of pregnancy. But when she dreams that she enters a rose garden and sits in it, and sees a thorn hitting her, this is a sign of the death of the pregnant woman. She is in a financial crisis, but it ends quickly. When she dreams about her husband, he is in pain from a thorn and tries to remove it, but he cannot remove it. Declaring the love and honesty between them. Interpretation of a dream about thorns in a dream for a young man who sees that he has a large garden with roses, but he is struck by a thorn, which shows that he will get the job that he wants and is looking for a lot. As for the dreamer with a girl, they are hurting because of a thorn in her hand and she raises it. Remove that indicates the appearance of the relationship. Love between them ends in marriage. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with Refer to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing mangoes in a dream by leading scholars?

preview.html: Seeing mango in a dream and its interpretationMango is considered one of the most famous types of fruit that many people love and accept to eat constantly. Some people are exposed to seeing mango in a dream, which has many different meanings and interpretations, which vary between good and evil, and through this article we will learn about the best interpretations. That happened when you see it in a dream. Interpretation of mangoes in a dream: Seeing it is a good thing, as it indicates a large amount of sustenance and abundant money, and it is a sign of great goodness for the dreamer. Seeing large quantities in dreams is evidence of the collapse of worries, the alleviation of distress, and a solution to all the problems and crises that he suffers from. The dreamer in reality. One mango in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees mangoes in a dream as evidence of the abundant blessings that he will enjoy in the coming days as a result of his fear of God (the Most High) in all his actions. If one sees mangoes in his dream, this is a sign of joyful news It will reach his ears in the near future and will spread joy and happiness around him. In case the dreamer sees mangoes during his sleep, it means that he will get many things that he has dreamed of for a long time and this will make him very happy. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with mangoes symbolizes his promotion in his workplace to get He has a very special status among his colleagues, and as a result he will gain the appreciation and respect of everyone around him. If a man sees mangoes in his dream, this is a sign that he will recover from a health condition, and as a result he will suffer from severe pain, and his condition will improve a lot in the coming days. Interpretation of mango consumption When he sees him eating Mango, this indicates goodness and means that the dreamer will spend some happy moments in his real life, and also indicates happy and joyful news that promises the dreamer many things. If the beads are green, this means that the dreamer is a wise person in his actions, and that he is rethinking many things. Before making decisions, and when it is green it is also a sign of loss of anxiety and worry. . And God knows best. If his seeds are yellow, then this is a sign of happiness in reality, and that he will live a happy and fulfilling life, and it is a sign of happiness, joy, and security after fear. You have a dream that confuses you in waiting for it.. An Egyptian Google site for dream interpretation. A mango tree in a dream. When their trees are seen, This means that there is a lot of good news awaiting the dreamer, and the bushes also mean that the owner of the vision is a person who has a good reputation among the people. If the cores break in the dream, this is hateful and bad for him, as it means that he will suffer from insomnia and indifference and that he will also be exposed to some material and manifold problems. In his life in general. For a traveler who sees his trees, this is a sign that his affairs and travel will be facilitated and that he will arrive safely. Mango in a dream for free people. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream of a mango means that she has received an offer of marriage from a person who suits her well and she will agree to it immediately and will be very happy in her life with him. If she sees The dreamer has mangoes in her dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a castle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a castle in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, is that seeing a castle in a dream indicates religiosity, humility, and purity, as well as staying away from sins and corrupt morals, because it indicates achieving goals and ambition. It is a castle built in a difficult to reach place and is often located on top of a mountain or on the sea. It was built for the purpose of obtaining a storehouse of weapons, money, and various uses for the castle, but when we see the castle in a dream, it has many clues and interpretations learned. About this article today, because we know that the dream differs from one person to another. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s palace: Seeing a castle in a dream indicates that it is a positive change in life and progress towards a better situation for the pioneer. Seeing a castle in a dream Seeing a castle in a dream is a sign of travel and a symbol of comfort. . Also, a castle in a dream indicates elevation and high status. As Ibn Sirin said, seeing a castle in a dream indicates victory and achieving goals. Seeing a castle in a dream indicates abandoning sins and disobedience and taking refuge in God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a castle for Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation indicates seeing a palace Or a fortress in a dream indicates fortification with the Holy Qur’an against enemies. Dreaming of seeing a castle in a dream also, a castle in a dream shows leaders and managers in reality. Seeing the windows of a castle indicates the presence of soldiers and guards. As for seeing building a castle in a dream, this indicates that he will be wary of Enemies and he can protect himself. A castle in a dream also symbolizes the abandonment of sins in reality. A closed castle in a dream is a sign of obstacles in life. Opening a palace in a dream was also evidence of marriage to a virgin woman. Interpretation of a dream about a castle for single peopleDream to see a castle in Seeing a castle in your dream means transcendence and self-transcendence. Seeing a single girl as if she entered a castle in a dream indicates her good luck. Also, seeing a castle in a girl’s dream means that she will get married and have children. Interpretation of a dream about a castle for a married woman: A married woman who sees a palace indicates The dream indicates that it is already covering it. Likewise, seeing a married woman in a dream means getting rid of fears and sadness. Seeing a palace in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happiness, peace and security. Seeing a married woman as if her house has turned into a palace shows in reality the strength of her home and her psychological stability. And the material. Interpretation of a dream about a castle for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman seeing a palace in a dream indicates success in her life and the fulfillment of her dreams. Seeing a castle in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is a symbol of a protected woman. Dreaming about seeing a castle in a dream. A woman seeing a palace in general in a dream is a sign of ambition and success. And security. Interpretation of a single man’s dream in a dream. Seeing a single man opening a castle in a dream means that he will marry a virgin girl. Seeing a dream of demolishing a castle. Dreaming of seeing a castle in a dream. Seeing a person in a dream that he is inside a beautiful castle means that he will assume a leadership position or that he will get married and seeing the building of the castle in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Luqman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surah Luqman in a dream. There are many visions and dreams that all people see in a dream, and among these visions the visions that people see or hear are verses and surahs from the Holy Quran. Seeing yourself reading Surat Luqman in a dream shows reason and wisdom in transactions because it indicates a lot of knowledge and the acquisition of money, and Surat Luqman in a dream shows the strong relationship between the servant and his Lord. Watching or listening to Surat Luqman for single women. Seeing a single girl in her sleep or listening to Surat Yasin. Many interpretations are explained by many interpretation scholars. Thus, this vision was interpreted as a sign of the improvement of this girl’s condition. If she was in a bad psychological state, then this vision indicates an improvement in her psychological condition. Likewise, seeing or hearing an unmarried girl from Surah Yasin in a dream indicates that she is an unmarried girl. That this girl will soon marry a pregnant young man. He has many good qualities and good morals as well. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is reciting Surah Yasin to many children. This indicates that this single girl will get... She gets a promotion at her work and occupies an important position. And a girl sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Yasin to herself. Glass. This indicates that this girl always follows the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Seeing or hearing Surat Luqman for a married woman, and because the interpretation of a married woman’s dream differs from the interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpretation scholars interpreted seeing or hearing Surat Yasin in a dream about a married woman as follows: Next.Seeing a married woman in a dream or hearing Surah Yasin indicates that she is described as a righteous woman who carries out her religious duties. She also always seeks to protect her home and children from all harm. Fortifying them with the Holy Qur’an. But seeing or hearing a married woman in a dream of Surah Yasin. This woman was looking for pregnancy and was waiting for this vision. Good news for this woman and may God bless her with this pregnancy soon. From God Almighty. And that she will have a healthy child and she and her child will be safe. Also, seeing or hearing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates Surah Yasin. This woman is a well-qualified woman. Seeing or hearing Surah Luqman for a divorced woman. Seeing or hearing a divorced woman in a dream indicates Surah Yasin. Good skin for divorced women helps this woman get rid of her problems and fears about her suffering at this time. Seeing a divorced woman reciting Surah Yasin with her ex-husband indicates that she will return to her husband and enjoy a stable and peaceful life with him. Seeing or hearing Surat Luqman for a man. Seeing or hearing a man in a dream indicates Surah Yasin. However, this man. He has many good qualities and always wants to follow them. The Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, in dealing with others. If the man is a merchant and sees or hears Surah Yasin in his dream, then this is what happens. It indicates that this

title: Whoever exposes his private parts in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for a person whose organs were revealed in a dream on various occasions. The areola is one of the things that God has commanded to be covered, whether for a man or a woman, and its disclosure is limited to the husband only. The private part or its exposure in a dream is a vision that carries many meanings and repercussions, as a man’s aura differs from a woman’s aura, and the interpretation also differs according to the situation in which the dreamer finds himself and his feelings. It was tested against the duration of the dream, so the encyclopedia gives you more details. Interpretation of a dream about someone who is naked in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin interprets nudity in a dream as a sign of the disappearance of the veil, and the rejoicing of the enemies of the dreamer, and whoever sees in his dream that he is revealing his nakedness, then he will reveal One of his secrets is how much he was. It is seen from his nakedness, but if he tries to cover his nakedness with a piece of cloth, this is evidence that he will examine and study it carefully. For example, his nakedness is visible, and he does not see it, and he is ashamed of it, as a sign that he will continue to do good deeds that do not harm him. But if he is not ashamed of the appearance of his nakedness and does not see him visible and he has clothes, then it will save him from severe distress, and if he is sick, he will recover, God willing, or he will pay for it. His debt if he had a debt, and what he wished for, and a sign that he will lose his place. As for the one who got rid of it and his nakedness was not exposed, this is good news that he is safe from it. Some things, and that it saves one from the magic of enemies. Interpretation of a dream for someone who is naked in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi confirms the saying of Ibn Sirin, where he sees that whoever finds that his clothes reveal his nakedness, this is a sign of the disappearance of the blessing of the veil. And his problems, as well as paying off debts, and his feeling of security in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about someone who exposed his nakedness in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: As for Ibn Shaheen, he believes that whoever finds in his dream that his private parts are exposed and asks people to cover him, his secrets will be revealed to everyone, if he feels ashamed in A dream. He is stripped of all his clothes, and his nakedness remains covered with clothes, so this is a sign of concealment from God and forgiveness of the dreamer, and in the event of his disobedience, it is a completely hateful scene. Ibn Shaheen adds that whoever sees in a dream that his clothes have been removed inside the mosque, this is good news that he will be cleansed of his sins and transgressions. If a woman sees herself without clothes, this is not a good thing at all because if she has a husband, she will divorce him, or she will be exposed to some troubles and troubles in her married life, and it could also be a sign of righteousness and insolence for her. Interpretation of a dream about someone whose nakedness is exposed in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men: Interpretation of a dream about someone whose organs are being exposed in a dream to an unmarried woman: An unmarried woman seeing her organs in a dream may be a sign that relief is on her way, and seeing her may be good news that she will get married soon, God willing. And if the unmarried woman finds in her dream that she is sleeping, and her nakedness is exposed from the iron This may be a sign of her falling into evil or harm to her. But if an unmarried woman sees that her nudity is exposed in front of people, this is a sign that her secrets will be revealed and her relationship will be revealed to everyone. Interpretation of a dream about someone whose nudity is exposed in a dream for a married woman: seeing the genitals in a dream or Exposing her to a married woman

title: Interpretation of a dream that my brother gives me coins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my brother giving me coins in a dream In case you are asking, dear reader, about the interpretation of a dream about my brother giving me coins according to the interpretations of scholars and translators, all of this and much more...Interpretation of a dream about my brother giving me coins in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my brother giving me coins in The dream may mean his need for good treatment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself giving someone coins in a dream, this may indicate the need for the dreamer to treat him well, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If the dreamer sees himself giving coins to someone This may be a sign of increased sustenance and that God has all knowledge. If the dreamer sees giving money to a person known for cooperation and beneficial work with God, he knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a blind brother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for a blind brother in a dream could be a sign of disagreements between them and God, the Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees his brother blind, this may lead to deep disagreements between them, and God knows all that is unseen. If a married woman sees her brother blind in a dream, this may indicate some serious differences between them, and God knows best. If a young man sees his brother blind in a dream, he can express the differences between them, and God is Most High. If a young man sees a brother who died as a witness, he may resort to good behavior, and God knows all that he does not see. If the dreamer sees the slaughter of a camel in a dream, this may be a sign of some changes and a need to get closer to God, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the slaughter of a camel, this may lead to some unpleasant things happening to him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees the slaughter of a camel, it may lead to problems at work or in the family, and God knows best. However, seeing a dear person in a dream can It is a sign of goodness and happiness, and God has all knowledge. If a divorced woman sees her lover in a dream, this may be evidence of her happiness and that she receives good news, and God is All-Knowing. title: Dreams that indicate the imminent marriage of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreams indicating imminent marriageThe science of dream interpretation is one of the broad sciences that includes many interpretations and results of the visions that the sleeper sees in a dream, in addition to determining the good and evil of this vision for the dreamer, on the other hand. Among the interpretations that indicate the imminent marriage of an unmarried girl or an unmarried young man, or signs of marriage in general, in this regard, we will learn in this article about the dreams that indicate the imminence of marriage. Signs of imminent engagement in reality. There is no doubt that marriage is one of the universal rules urged by heavenly laws. , especially Islamic law, to preserve reproduction, offspring, and the survival of the nation. In this article, we will learn about the signs of an imminent engagement in reality, including: One of the most important visions that may indicate that a single woman is about to get married is to see the marriage bed. A girl seeing herself in the marriage bed in a dream and doing things like cohabitation and marital relations foretells her imminent marriage. Seeing robes, fields, agricultural land, and wearing shoes are all signs of an imminent engagement. Dreams that indicate the approaching marriage: Seeing a sheep and wearing a new ring in a dream is among the visions that indicate On the approaching engagement and marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman shopping for new clothes or seeing herself wearing a new dress portends marriage. A single person’s dream of riding a camel is a sign of marriage. Seeing meetings or parties, reuniting family and relatives, is good news for the marriage of single people. Also seeing our master Zechariah, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream is good for the marriage of an unmarried woman. Death for a single person. Individual entrance to Paradise. If an unmarried girl sees someone giving her a gift or making a ring for her and wearing it, this is good for her marriage. See also: Symbols that indicate an answer to prayers in a dream for a single, married, and pregnant woman. Three symbols It indicates the approach of marriage. To continue talking about the signs of approaching marriage in a dream, whether for a single girl or a young man, in addition to other people, from here many people search for the most important symbols of approaching marriage, such as: Seeing the Holy Qur’an in a dream indicates the conventions of the Qur’an. Also, seeing a pilgrimage to the Sacred House of God is one of the dreams that indicates the approach of marriage. Seeing a bed and changing the bed for single people also portends the approach of marriage. Dreaming of a girl wearing a wedding dress is one of the signs that indicate that you are about to get married. A dream in which you are wearing shoes means Also, you are about to get married. Dreams indicate the approach of marriage: Also, death in a dream means moving to a golden cage. Entering heaven and seeing it in a dream symbolizes marriage and a happy and peaceful life. Seeing a young lady in a dream is one of the visions that suggests that she will marry a prominent man. Dreaming about planting and watering is also a symbol of marital intimacy. Signs in a dream indicating delayed marriage. In fact, there have been many interpretations by scholars regarding seeing signs of marriage in a dream, in addition to the fact that there are many dreams

title: Interpretation of a dream about medicine by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dream about medicine in a dream has many interpretations that differ depending on the situation in which the medicine appears. It indicates the marriage of an unmarried woman, and it can indicate a barren boy, and its interpretation can be money for the poor, and in this article we will give you all possible interpretations of seeing medicine in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing medicine. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing medicine in a dream as a sign of gaining useful knowledge. Salah al-Din told the dreamer that drinking it was a medicine to stabilize the body. If the medicine was drunk, and it had a bitter or bad taste, then this indicates an illness, but it will go away. And seeing the medicine in a dream that was yellow indicates a serious illness. And the medicinal drink, which had a foul taste It indicates a financial crisis and a need for money. Drinking medicine easily in a dream without feeling any harm is evidence of recovery from the disease. Interpretation of drug control for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees medicine is evidence of her closeness to a person of good character, and this happens in the event that the medicine Sweet and delicious. As for the vision? A dream about medical medicine indicates the problems you face during the marriage period and may indicate that it is about to end. Interpretation of a medical visit for a married woman: A married woman seeing light medicine in a dream indicates a good husband, a good life, love and affection between them. And seeing medicines may It indicates repayment of debts.Interpretation of monitoring medicines for pregnant women. A pregnant woman seeing medicine in a dream indicates a natural birth and may be a sign that God will bless her with a good and righteous child.Interpretation of taking medicine in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing or buying medicine as a sign of harm or harm to the dreamer. Anyone who takes drugs from someone he knows indicates that the dreamer will benefit from money, influence, and power. As for giving medicine to someone you know, it is a waste of money or the loss of a loved one or a person. Interpretation of giving medicine to the deceased in a dream. Scholars’ explanation: Give medicine to the dead. It appears in the dream the loss of a family member, and often Unless this person is elderly or suffering from an illness. But if he sees the dead person taking the medicine himself, or taking it himself, then this is evidence of the mercy he bestows on his good deeds. Interpretation of buying medicine from a pharmacy in a dream: In general, the pharmacy in a dream symbolizes the government and administration, and buying Medicines from the pharmacy in a dream are evidence of a promotion at work, receiving support, compensation, a gift, or obtaining a sum of money. Interpretation of drug use for single women. Interpretation of drug drinking for singles has many interpretations, the most important of which is that this song is waiting for good news. This life can only change at best, especially in social life, such as announcing a happy marriage to someone you love. If this medicine has a sweet taste, this means that the single person lives. A life full of happiness and fun. She can get a promotion in her job, get a lot of money, and advance in her career. Interpretation of asking for medicine in a dream: Prescription

A life full of happiness and fun. She can get a promotion in her job, get a lot of money, and advance in her career. Interpretation of asking for medicine in a dream: Prescription

title: Interpretation of the dream of Hajj in a dream and seeing the rituals of Hajj by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: There are many clues revolving around the interpretation of a dream about Hajj in a dream, but in general it is praiseworthy and indicates goodness and the achievement of goals and aspirations. On a website in a dream we will talk about this topic in detail, just follow us by reading to benefit from it. Interpretation of a dream about Hajj Seeing someone performing Performing Hajj in a dream indicates peace of mind and the removal of all worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from. It also shows that he made a lot of money through his trade. The vision of going for Hajj with the family, but not at the time of Hajj, indicates success in life for all family members, And God knows best. In the event that a person is seen walking around the Holy House, this indicates the uprightness of religion and the uprightness of that person. His desire to perform all household chores and his continuous efforts to get closer to God Almighty. But if he sees that he has gone out to perform the Hajj period, this indicates the fulfillment of what he wants. It may also indicate the payment of debts, and it may indicate recovery from illness, and God knows best. We recommend: Seeing the Kaaba in an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for Hajj. If a person sees in a dream that he is preparing to perform the Hajj obligation, this indicates many good things on his way to it. If he This dreamer is suffering from debts, so this dream indicates that he will pay all his debts. This vision may also indicate the longevity of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about Hajj If one sees in a dream that he is going to Hajj and preparing for it, this indicates the good that the dreamer will attain. As this indicates The vision is about achieving ambitions and goals, as well as paying off debts and recovering from illness. This vision also shows wealth and prosperity after poverty and misery. And seeing someone performing the Hajj or Umrah if it indicates something that indicates the righteousness of the dreamer, his closeness to God, and knowledge of the foundations of his religion. Read also: Hearing the call to prayer In a dream, interpretation of a dream about Umrah for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is going to Hajj, then this vision will be better for her. As this vision shows that she will marry a good and righteous man who appreciates and respects her. While an unmarried woman seeing the Kaaba in her dream indicates her marriage to a generous man. Seeing the Black Stone in a dream indicates her marriage to a wealthy man. If she sees herself climbing Mount Arafat, this indicates a happy marriage, generosity and honor. If she dreams that she is drinking Zamzam water, this indicates that she will marry a man of great stature and wealth. Interpretation of a dream about Hajj for a married woman. Seeing Hajj In a dream, in general, it is a good dream. Therefore, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing for Hajj, this means that she will soon become pregnant with a child, in the event that she is preparing for Hajj at the time of Hajj. If a married woman dreams of performing Hajj rituals, this indicates the abundance of goodness that will come. For her and her children. If she sees her walking around the Kaaba, this indicates her good condition and the end of the disputes and problems that this woman suffers from with her husband, and God knows best. I read about that: Interpretation of supplication in a dream. Also watch the video of the interpretation of a dream about Hajj in a dream. We have reached the end of the topic that we talked about. It contains detailed explanation of the solution

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calm sea in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Many married women often see the sea in their dreams, because this vision carries many and multiple meanings. This is why dream interpreters differ in clarifying the interpretation of seeing the calm sea in a married woman’s dream from the scholar and the dream interpreter, as we will explain in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a dirham in a dream. Seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a calm sea in a married woman’s dream indicates a state of stability. Emotional and financial in her life with her husband and children. The calmness of the sea in a married woman’s dream also indicates that this woman will suffer from many great livelihoods and a lot of lawful money in the coming period. The sea may indicate for a married woman that this woman and her husband are traveling for fun. If the dreamer has problems and fears, then seeing a calm sea portends peace, comfort and tranquility that the dreamer will enjoy in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about smoke in a dream for a single woman - a symbol of seeing smoke in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the seashore in a dream for a married woman: Standing in front of the beach The calm vision of the dreamer, her husband, and her children is a sign of blessing in their lives as a result of their closeness to God Almighty. As for seeing a rough beach, this may indicate that the dreamer will go through many successive crises in the near future. If the dreamer is sick, then her standing and sitting on a beach The calm sea could herald this woman’s imminent recovery, by God Almighty’s command, from her illness. Al-Nabulsi says that the charming calmness of a married woman indicates the imminent pregnancy of a male child for that woman in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a bear in a dream for a single woman – a symbol of seeing a bear in a dream Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a clear, calm sea. If a married woman finds that she can swim in a calm sea, this promises her that she will be able to overcome the adversities and difficulties that she faces in her life. A married woman suffers from financial problems and debts and suffers from poverty and distress, and seeing her swimming in a calm sea It indicates that this woman has overcome the stage of financial problems and got rid of this crisis. Swimming in the calm sea indicates many happy occasions for the dreamer in the coming period. Swimming for a woman who is late in giving birth is one of the signs of fulfilling her dream of giving birth in a period close to this vision. Interpretation Dreaming of a tambourine in a dream. Seeing a calm sea in a divorced woman’s dream. A divorced woman who sees that the sea that appears in a dream is calm, this indicates the control of the dwelling and comfort in her life and relieves her of her worries and sorrows. Also, the calm sea in the dream of a divorced woman indicates the good conditions of her children, and this is good news. May God Almighty grant her success in raising her children. If the dreamer wants to work in a good job, the calm sea can portend a good job opportunity for her. But if the dreamer is already working, then seeing the calm, clear sea is one of the signs of her promotion at work and taking a distinguished position in the workplace. This work. Interpretation of a dream about begging
